agreementToTerms.title: Agreement to Terms
agreementToTerms.description1: By accessing or using our website, you agree to be bound by these Terms of Service and all applicable laws and regulations. If you do not agree with any of these terms, you are prohibited from using or accessing this site.
agreementToTerms.description2: The materials contained on this website are protected by applicable copyright and trademark law.

useLicense.title: Use License
useLicense.description: Permission is granted to temporarily download one copy of the materials on our website for personal, non-commercial transitory viewing only. This is the grant of a license, not a transfer of title, and under this license you may not:

restrictions.commercial: Use the materials for any commercial purpose or for any public display
restrictions.reverse: Attempt to reverse engineer any software contained on the website
restrictions.copyright: Remove any copyright or other proprietary notations from the materials
restrictions.transfer: Transfer the materials to another person or 'mirror' the materials on any other server

accountRegistration.title: Account Registration
accountRegistration.description: You may be required to register an account to access certain features of our website. By registering, you agree to:

requirements.accurate: Provide accurate, current and complete information
requirements.maintain: Maintain and update your information to keep it accurate
requirements.security: Maintain the security of your password and identification
requirements.responsibility: Accept all responsibility for activities that occur under your account
requirements.notify: Immediately notify us of any unauthorized use of your account

productInformation.title: Product Information
productInformation.description1: We strive to provide accurate product descriptions, images and pricing. However, we make no warranties that product descriptions or other content on this site are accurate, complete, reliable, current or error-free.
productInformation.description2: If a product offered by us is not as described, your sole remedy is to return it in unused condition.

pricingAndPayment.title: Pricing and Payment
pricingAndPayment.description1: All prices are displayed in the selected currency and may be changed without notice. We reserve the right to change prices at any time.
pricingAndPayment.description2: Payment must be received before we ship your order. We accept various payment methods as indicated at checkout.
pricingAndPayment.description3: All sales are final unless otherwise stated. Returns are subject to our return policy.

shippingAndDelivery.title: Shipping and Delivery
shippingAndDelivery.description1: We will make every effort to ship your order within the stated timeframes. However, delivery times are estimates and are not guaranteed.
shippingAndDelivery.description2: Risk of loss and title to products purchased from us pass to you upon delivery to the carrier. You are responsible for filing any claims with carriers for damaged or lost shipments.

returnsAndRefunds.title: Returns and Refunds
returnsAndRefunds.description1: Our return policy is detailed on our Returns page. By making a purchase, you agree to our return policy.
returnsAndRefunds.description2: We reserve the right to refuse returns that do not meet our return policy requirements.

prohibitedUses.title: Prohibited Uses
prohibitedUses.description: You may not use our website:

items.violate: In any way that violates any applicable law or regulation
items.transmit: To transmit any material that is offensive, harassing or otherwise objectionable
items.impersonate: To impersonate or attempt to impersonate the company or any employee
items.infringe: In any way that infringes upon the rights of others
items.automated: To engage in any automated use of the system

limitationOfLiability.title: Limitation of Liability
limitationOfLiability.description: In no event shall White-Shop or its suppliers be liable for any damages (including, without limitation, damages for loss of data or profit, or due to business interruption) arising out of the use or inability to use the materials on our website, even if we or an authorized representative has been notified orally or in writing of the possibility of such damage.

revisionsAndErrata.title: Revisions and Errata
revisionsAndErrata.description: The materials appearing on our website may include technical, typographical or photographic errors. We do not warrant that any of the materials on the website are accurate, complete or current. We may make changes to the materials contained on the website at any time without notice.

governingLaw.title: Governing Law
governingLaw.description: These terms and conditions are governed by and construed in accordance with applicable laws. Any disputes relating to these terms shall be subject to the exclusive jurisdiction of the courts of our business location.

contactInformation.title: Contact Information
contactInformation.description: If you have questions about these Terms of Service, please contact us at:
